scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of two letters to Edwin Osgood Grover.

did.unittitle: Letter to Edwin Osgood Grover 1931 January 31

scopecontent.p: Churchill is flattered that Grover has asked him to contribute to the Animated Magazine; however he decided to give up publishing and public appearances ten years ago.

did.unittitle: Letter to Edwin Osgood Grover 1931 February 22

scopecontent.p: Churchill has a low opinion of his own works and has discouraged their circulation.
